Summary: The three of us were on my drive way whe we looked up to see an orange glowing ball moving from south to the north turning norht east.....as they moved away some started to change colors from a single organge ball to red mixed with orange.....t
trends: There has been one other sighting in Midlothian
There were no other sightings in Midlothian on or around July 13th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAside from the description above they were in a row with a decent amount of space between them so much so that it appeared there was just one initially then another followed totally 3....like I said they started out as a glowing ball and then as they sped up and disappeared into the sky heading north east or east they started to get multiable colors of red and orange....at one point the one in the distance appeared to emit bright orange shining up ward from a straight line. Later some one sent me the "you tube video" Tinley Ufo sighting 2004 and it is literally without a shred of a doubt the exact thing we all saw.
